marklogic.body: Brandon stop thinking you know everything and listen the Jaguars aren't giving Britton snaps at other positions because he is not 100% going to be the RT. If they want someone else to take snaps at RT they would put them at RT they would not move Britton to another Spot. The only advantage to Britton taking snaps at a different Spot is for him to Gain experience at that Spot. So what if they blitzed Solders side? If the defense blitzes more guys then they have blockers someone is not getting blocked. I don't care if it's Boselli out there he's not blocking more than one guy.
